siteMeta.title: DASARI SAI PRAVEEN - IoT Developer | Full-Stack Engineer
siteMeta.description: IoT Developer and Full-Stack Engineer with 63 IoT projects, 34 major implementations, and experience building real-time systems using React, Django and embedded systems.
siteMeta.author: DASARI SAI PRAVEEN

hero.lead: Innovative IoT Developer and Full-Stack Engineer building real-time systems and embedded solutions. Developed 63 IoT projects including 34 major implementations and 29 mini-projects.

about.summary: Innovative IoT Developer and Full-Stack Engineer with extensive experience in building real-time systems and embedded solutions. As Chairperson of ASME, guided 53 student projects. Expertise in React, Django, microcontroller programming, and real-time tracking systems.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Mechanical Engineering
education.institution: Vignan Institute of Information Technology, Visakhapatnam

achievements: Led 150+ member student organization focused on technical innovation
Guided 53 student projects (29 major + 24 mini projects)
Organized 15+ technical workshops on IoT, embedded systems, and web development

keyProjects.title: Smart DriveMate - IoT Vehicle Tracking
keyProjects.short: Real-time GPS tracking, geo-fencing, speed alerts, remote engine lock and theft prevention.
keyProjects.description: Real-time GPS tracking with interactive map, geo-fencing with instant notifications, speed limit alerts, remote engine lock/unlock, motion-based theft detection, mobile & web dashboard.

keyProjects.title: Real-Time Attendance System
keyProjects.short: Facial recognition based attendance, analytics, role-based dashboard and automated notifications.
keyProjects.description: Full-stack real-time attendance system with facial recognition, analytics dashboards, role-based access and SMS/email notifications.

keyProjects.title: Transport Management System
keyProjects.short: Route optimization using Google Maps, live traffic integration and driver analytics.
keyProjects.description: Dynamic route optimization with Google Maps API, live traffic data, driver performance analytics and fuel consumption tracking.

keyProjects.title: Smart Home Automation v4.0
keyProjects.short: Voice controlled home automation with energy analytics and mobile app integration.
keyProjects.description: Comprehensive home automation system supporting voice commands via Alexa/Google Assistant, real-time energy usage monitoring, and remote control via mobile app.

keyProjects.title: Industrial Monitoring System
keyProjects.short: IoT based industrial machine health monitoring and predictive maintenance.
keyProjects.description: Monitors vibration, temperature, and current consumption of industrial motors to predict failures before they happen using edge ML.

keyProjects.title: Precision Agriculture System
keyProjects.short: Automated irrigation and soil health monitoring for smart farming.
keyProjects.description: Uses soil moisture sensors and weather data to automate irrigation, saving water and improving crop yield.

keyProjects.title: Smart City Solutions Suite
keyProjects.short: Integrated system for smart waste management and street light control.
keyProjects.description: Optimizes waste collection routes based on bin fill levels and manages street lights based on ambient light and presence.

keyProjects.title: E-commerce Platform
keyProjects.short: Full featured multi-vendor e-commerce platform with payment gateway.
keyProjects.description: A scalable e-commerce application with user authentication, product search, cart functionality, and Stripe integration.

keyProjects.title: Inventory Management System
keyProjects.short: Real-time inventory tracking for warehouses with barcode support.
keyProjects.description: Web-based inventory system allowing check-in/check-out of stock via barcode scanning and reporting.

keyProjects.title: Hospital Management Portal
keyProjects.short: Patient records and appointment scheduling system.
keyProjects.description: Digitalizes patient health records and streamlines appointment booking for hospitals.

keyProjects.title: Environmental Monitoring
keyProjects.short: Air quality monitoring network for urban areas.
keyProjects.description: Deploys a network of sensors to map air quality (AQI) across the city in real-time.

keyProjects.title: Healthcare Monitoring Device
keyProjects.short: Wearable device for tracking elderly patient vitals.
keyProjects.description: Monitors heart rate, SpO2 and fall detection, alerting caregivers in emergencies.

certificates.notes: Place certificate images in /public/images/certificates/. The app uses placeholders if images are missing.
